title: Build FlashTrend short news application with viral updates and trending stories

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for news articles with fields: id, title, summary (short text limited to 280 characters), category (politics, viral, trending, social), timestamp, source, and shareCount

quotes: Latest political and social trending topics

acceptanceCriteria: News article model stores all required fields
Summary text is limited to 280 characters maximum
Category field accepts only: politics, viral, trending, social
Timestamp is automatically set on article creation

requirements.text: Implement backend methods to create, read, update, and delete news articles with pagination support (10 articles per page)
acceptanceCriteria: CRUD operations work correctly for news articles
Pagination returns exactly 10 articles per page
Articles are sorted by timestamp (newest first)

requirements.text: Add backend method to filter news articles by category (politics, viral, trending, social)

quotes: Latest political and social trending topics
Whether you are interested in politics, viral trends, or daily updates

acceptanceCriteria: Filter returns only articles matching the specified category
Filter works with pagination
Empty categories return empty results without errors

requirements.text: Implement backend method to increment shareCount when a news article is shared

quotes: Easy sharing option for social media

acceptanceCriteria: shareCount increments by 1 when share method is called
Share count persists across updates
Method returns updated article with new shareCount

requirements.text: Create a main news feed page displaying news articles in card format with title, summary, category badge, timestamp, and share count
acceptanceCriteria: Each news card displays all required fields clearly
Cards are visually distinct and easy to scan
Category badges use color coding for visual distinction
Timestamps show relative time (e.g., '2 hours ago')

requirements.text: Add category filter tabs (All, Politics, Viral, Trending, Social) at the top of the news feed that filter displayed articles

quotes: Latest political and social trending topics
Whether you are interested in politics, viral trends, or daily updates

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a category tab filters the news feed to show only that category
All tab shows articles from all categories
Active tab is visually highlighted
Filter applies immediately without page reload

requirements.text: Implement infinite scroll or pagination controls for the news feed to load articles 10 at a time
acceptanceCriteria: Additional articles load when user scrolls to bottom or clicks next page
Loading state is shown while fetching new articles
No duplicate articles appear in the feed
Performance remains smooth with large article counts

requirements.text: Add a share button to each news card that copies the article summary and title to clipboard and increments the share count

quotes: Easy sharing option for social media

acceptanceCriteria: Share button is clearly visible on each card
Clicking share copies formatted text to clipboard
Visual feedback confirms successful copy
Share count updates immediately in the UI
Backend shareCount increments on share action

requirements.text: Design a distinctive visual theme with bold typography, bright accent colors (avoiding blue and purple), and card-based layouts that convey speed and modernity appropriate for a fast-paced news application
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme uses bold, readable typography for headlines
Color scheme excludes blue and purple, uses energetic accent colors
Design conveys speed and immediacy through visual choices
Card layouts are clean with clear visual hierarchy
Theme is applied consistently across all components

requirements.text: Create an admin interface for adding new news articles with fields for title, summary (with 280 character limit), category selection, and source

quotes: FlashTrend focuses on delivering authentic and engaging content

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields with proper validation
Summary field enforces 280 character maximum
Category dropdown includes all valid options
Form submission creates new article in backend
Success/error feedback is shown after submission
Form clears after successful submission

constraints: Push notifications are not supported on this platform and should not be implemented
Real-time updates via WebSockets are not supported; use polling or manual refresh instead
Summary text must be limited to 280 characters maximum to ensure short, scannable content
nonGoals: Third-party news API integration or external content feeds
User authentication or personalized news feeds
Comments or user-generated content on articles

required: Modern lightning bolt logo icon in energetic colors for FlashTrend brand identity (flashtrend-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Abstract dynamic wave pattern background suggesting speed and movement in warm gradient colors (hero-background.dim_1920x400.png)

Set of 4 small category icons: megaphone for politics, fire for viral, trending arrow, and speech bubble for social in matching style (category-politics.dim_64x64.png, category-viral.dim_64x64.png, category-trending.dim_64x64.png, category-social.dim_64x64.png)
